description:
fixed the 5-3-0 section as it is played here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4JElq7C3Ojs

It is sort of hard to hear, but I believe this is how the album version is played as well.

The 7-4-6 etc section is still slightly off, i think he is sneaking in more open strings.

If you watch the video closely some of the chords are slightly different, but i cant get them to sound right yet.
title: Truth
